text: Syeda Anwara Taimur (24 November 1936 â€“ 28 September 2020) was an Indian politician. She was Chief Minister of Assam from 6 December 1980 to 30 June 1981. She was a leader of the Indian National Congress. Taimur died in Australia from cardiac arrest on 28 September 2020 at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Assam Category:Indian National Congress politicians
title: Anwara Taimur
